resources.string: Hi. I started off with my special Ninja move. Come on, explore more of me.
That was Ninja swipe Bottom move.
That was Ninja swipe Left move.
That was Ninja swipe Right move.
That was Ninja swipe Top move.
This double tap gets me rolling (literally).
This makes me a little dizzy.
Fading in and out from shadows like a ninja.
Come on play with me, don\'t leave me hanging! It\'s been some time now.
